DataElement.preferredDefinition: The instance number of a test that is repeated within a given timeframe for the same test. The level of granularity can vary, e.g., within a time point or within a visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to vital sign._An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to vital sign.

Property.preferredDefinition: An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity.

Concepts.definition: An integer that identifies the particular occurrence of a repeating activity or entity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the repetition numbe
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the repetition number within the time point for this measurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the repetition number of the measurement within the time point.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUPPVS.QVAL
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. This information could be submitted in a SUPPVS dataset as the value of SUPPVS.QVAL where SUPPVS.QNAM = "VSREPNUM" and SUPPVS.QLABEL= "Repetition Number within time point". Refer to the current SDTM and SDTMIG for instructions on placement of non-standard variables in SDTM domains.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The repetition number of the test/measurement within the time point may be pre-printed on the CRF. For example, multiple measurements of blood pressure or multiple analyses of a sample.

DataElement.changeDescription: 6.8.21 Released to support CDISC CDE metrics clean-up. mc  Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.27.18
